      void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
      Listener for keyboard input: affects the ball position forcing the ball to move on either a horizontal or vertical slope This function also looks at the isPlayer to determine whether it should move on either the y plane as Player 1 can only move up and down.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Listener for keyboard input: affects the ball position forcing the ball to move on either a horizontal or vertical slope This function also looks at the isPlayer to determine whether it should move on either the y plane as Player 1 can only move up and down.
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
